remarks: Vector addition for the closed kernel vector space dual.  (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2015.)
statement:
lcdvadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdvadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvadd.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lcdvadd.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
lcdvadd.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdvadd.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` C ) $.
lcdvadd.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdvadd $p |- ( ph -> .+b = .+ ) $.
